mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_donation ( fund_id, user_id, donation_amount, anonymous ) VALUES ( #{fundId}, #{userId}, #{donationAmount}, #{anonymous} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_donation_id, fund_id, user_id, donation_amount, anonymous FROM user_donation WHERE user_donation_id = #{userDonationId}
SELECT user_donation_id, fund_id, user_id, donation_amount, anonymous FROM user_donation WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_donation SET fund_id = #{fundId}, user_id = #{userId}, donation_amount = #{donationAmount}, anonymous = #{anonymous} WHERE user_donation_id = #{userDonationId}
mapper.select:
SELECT ud.user_donation_id AS userDonationId, ud.donation_amount AS donationAmount, ud.anonymous AS anonymous, p.name AS donationName, d.recipient AS recipient, d.target_amount AS targetAmount, (SELECT image_url FROM Image WHERE postId = p.product_id AND image_type = 'Funding' ORDER BY image_id ASC LIMIT 1) AS donationImageUrl
FROM user_donation ud JOIN fund f ON ud.fund_id = f.fund_id JOIN donation d ON f.product_id = d.product_id JOIN financial_product p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ud.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ud.user_donation_id DESC
